metadata.title: 2 Premio1 Mid-Size Stash Jars 100% Airtight Water/Smell Proof Pill Holder Container with 2 Sided Medical Emblems, Secures 100ct Nitro Bottle, Aspirin Medications Herbs, EDC Keychain Fob +1 Carabiner
features: Medical emblem will not peel. Incl; Silver & Ruby Red stash jar, key rings +2 spare O-ring seals +1 Carabiner
Holds standard 100 tablet Nitrostat bottle, NOT for 25 tablet bottle – oversized
Premio1 PROTECTS all your pills, herbs, medications, drugs, spices, liquids, and Dex4 glucose tablets
Stylish Rugged Travel Container perfect for pocket, purse, glove box, backpack
Solid Hi-Grade aluminum, O-ring seal & precision threads ensure 100% protection & keep odors in
description: The Premio1 Mid-Size Stash Jar is ideal for storing contents discreetly: herbs, medicines, pills, first aid, spices, candies, cosmetics, gels, creams, jewelry, ear buds, — anything you want to keep safe from the outside world! Easily identify the health-related contents of your Portable Stash Jar with this universally-recognized design. The emblem on the jar is a six-pointed star featuring the ‘Rod of Asclepius’ in the center. Both the star and Rod of Asclepius (an object in Greek mythology said to possess healing power) are internationally-accepted symbols that represent emergency medical care worldwide. This makes the Premio1 Stash Jar a best-in-class travel companion for active users, including for hiking, camping, fishing, hunting, skiing, biking, vacationing, and much more. Why is aluminum superior? Aluminum is a non-reactive material that will not leach or absorb chemicals, or rust, keeping the contents of your stash jar safe from contamination and providing peace of mind. With its anodized finish over solid construction, the jar is crafted to protect your contents from the outside world. An airtight seal keeps the elements out, even if submerged in water. The metal body also protects your contents from light. The Mid-size Stash Jar comes equipped with a key ring, so you can easily attach it to keys, a belt loop, purse, or backpack. The jar’s capacity is approximately 0.3 fluid ounces, or 8 mL. Want to store something smelly? We’ve got you covered. The rubber O-ring creates a seal between the lid and body ensuring no one can smell what’s inside. Remember, if the Premio1 Mid-size Stash Jar doesn’t meet your expectations in any way, we will be happy to provide you a full refund. We’re that confident you’ll love it! Interested in more container sizes or colors? Search for “Premio1” to check out our entire family of stash jars.
